name: Misunderstood Monsters
description:
This is my first VN, I am not an artist or a writer, but I gave it a go.

The game features  branching dialog, 4 endings (2 good, 2 bad), and some bad puns

Backgrounds and story are by me.

Charcter portraits were made with Rinmaru's Avatar creators, except the dragon which is a reskined section of one of printable heros works.

Music from Incompetech

Due to the deadline, the game has not be extensively tested, and my still have bugs, sorry
